com.tbg.adapter.paper.broker

Class PaperBroker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tbg.core.model.broker.BrokerBase
      • com.tbg.adapter.paper.broker.PaperBroker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBroker

    public class PaperBroker
extends BrokerBase
    PaperBroker
    For paper trading. Possibility to specify commission cost and slippage. At this stage every order passed to the PaperBroker will be fullfilled and executed. PaperBroker handles only MARKET Orders.
    History:
    - [13/lug/2012] Created. (sfl)
    - [30/mar/2013] unrealized pnl fixed (sfl)
    Author:
    sfl
